options.Enabled.desc: If the mod functionality is enabled.
options.LazyUpdates.desc: Update less frequently to improve performance.
options.ToggleKey.desc: The button used to toggle if the mod functionality is enabled.
options.EnableHarvestableBushItems.desc: Shows item drops for harvestable bushes.
options.EnableBreakableContainerItems.de: Shows item drops for breakable containers.
options.EnableDigSpotItems.desc: Shows item drops for artifact and seed spots.
options.EnableGeodeItems.desc: Shows item drops for processing geodes.
options.EnableGarbageCanItems.desc: Shows item drops for garbage cans.
options.EnablePaningSpotItems.desc: Shows item drops for panning locations.
options.EnableMineableObjectItems.desc: Shows item drops for mineable objects (stones in the mine etc).
options.EnableHarvestableTreeItems.desc: Shows item drops from shaking trees.
options.EnableTillableItems.desc: Shows item drops for tillable (dirt etc) tiles.
options.EnableHarvestableBushOutlines.de: Shows item drops for harvestable bushes.
options.EnableSpawnedOutlines.desc: Shows outlines for spawned objects (forage etc).
options.EnableDigSpotOutlines.desc: Shows outlines for artifact and seed spots.
Shows an colored outine around garbage cans to indicate if an npc is too close.
options.EnableMineableObjectOutlines.des: Shows outlines for mineable objects (stones in the mine etc).
options.EnableTillableOutlines.desc: Shows outlines for tillable (dirt etc) tiles with predicted item drops.
options.EnableLadderOutlines.desc: Shows outlines around ladders in mines.
options.EnableMonstersHideLadders.desc: When mosters are present, the location of ladders is not displayed.
options.EnableObjectOutlines.desc: Shows outlines for all objects, this includes many of the above options.
options.TrackDigSpots.desc: Track nearby artifact and seed spots.
options.TrackSpawned.desc: Track nearby spawned spawned objects (forage etc)
options.TrackerMenuMaxItemCount.desc: The maximum number of items to display in tracker menus, 0 for no limit.
options.TrackerMenuMaxItemDistance.desc: The maximum distance for items to display in tracker menus, 0 for no limit.
options.TrackerMenuShowLess.desc: Show only icons, direction arrows, and distance in tracker menus.
options.ShowFishInMinigame.desc: Shows what fish is being caught in the fishing minigame.
options.ShowBait.desc: Show equiped bait when fishing rod is equiped.
options.ShowTackle.desc: Show equiped tackle when fishing rod is equiped.
options.ShowFishChances.desc: Shows fish chances when fishing rod is equiped.
options.EstimateFishChances.desc: Estimates fish chances instead of calculating chances by simulating catching fish.
options.NumFishCatches.desc: The maximum number of fish to remember when simulating catching fish to calculate fish chances. 'Estimate fish chances' must be off. Requires restart to take effect.
options.ShowTrashChances.desc: Shows trash chances when fishing rod is equiped.
options.ShowSecretNoteChances.desc: Shows secret note chances when fishing rod is equiped.
options.ShowUncaughtFish.desc: Show details about fish that have not been caought yet. If disabled, the uncaught fish are replaced by question marks in the list.
options.ShowLessFishInfo.desc: Only shows icons and chances in fising menu.
options.ShowCalicoJackOutcome.desc: Shows the next cards drawn when using 'Hit', and the result if using 'Stand'.
options.ShowSlotsOutcome.desc: Shows Win multiplier for Calico Slots, 0x means a loss. The multiplier changes over time.
options.MenuType.desc: The type of background to use for menus.
options.MenuScale.desc: Scales the size of the menu.
options.MenuAlpha.desc: The transparency of the menu, where 0 is fully transparent, and 1 is fully opaque.
config.general.title: General
config.items.title: Items
config.outlines.title: Outlines
config.trackers.title: Trackers
config.fishing.title: Fishing
config.minigames.title: Minigames
config.menu.title: Menu
